cut corners.translation[0].definitions[0: to save time, money, or energy by doing things quickly and not as carefully as you should
Don’t try to cut corners when you’re decorating.
cut corners.translation[1].definitions[0: to do something in a way that saves time, effort, or money, but that also results in it not being done properly
There’s a temptation to cut corners when you’re pushed for time, but it’s not worth it.
